channel.title: Blog on Tyler Kennedy
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Tyler Kennedy

item.title: How To Mute and Hide Threads on Twitter
item.description: Twitter gives users the ability to mute content from being shown on their timeline. Learn how you can mute words to hide threads on Twitter.

item.title: How to Build a Website for Your iOS App With Carrd
item.description: Carrd is an easy to use website building tool. You can quickly create well-designed landing page for your iOS app without coding to link to from the App Store.
